document.full_text: the new orleans police department too often uses excessive force, conducts illegal stops and arrests, and has a pattern of discriminating on the basis of race, gender and sexual orientation, the u.s. department of justice said in a report on thursday.
document.title: doj cites new orleans police for rights violations
